data.title: New Orleans Pelicans Color Codes Hex, RGB, and CMYK
data.meta_description: The New Orleans Pelicans colors are Midnight Blue, Red, Gold and White. This page includes their Hex, RGB, HSB and CMYK color codes.
data.text:
The New Orleans Pelicans colors are Pelicans navy, Pelicans red, and Pelicans gold. The New Orleans Pelicans team colors in Hex, RGB, and CMYK can be found below. The New Orleans Pelicans are a team from New Orleans, Louisiana. The biggest rivals of the New Orleans Pelicans are the Oklahoma City Thunder.

New Orleans Pelicans Primary Colors

The primary colors of the New Orleans Pelicans can be found in the table below.

New Orleans Pelicans Pantone Color Codes

The New Orleans Pelicans NBA team Pantone colors are PMS 289 C for Pelicans navy, PMS 186 C for Pelicans red, and PMS 872 C for Pelicans gold.

The Pelicans navy Pantone color of the New Orleans Pelicans can be found below.

PMS 289 C

The Pelicans red Pantone color of the New Orleans Pelicans can be found below.

PMS 186 C

The Pelicans gold Pantone color of the New Orleans Pelicans can be found below.

PMS 872 C

New Orleans Pelicans Color Codes HEX

The New Orleans Pelicans colors HEX codes are #0C2340 for Pelicans navy, #C8102E for Pelicans red, and #85714D for Pelicans gold.

The Pelicans navy HEX color code for the New Orleans Pelicans basketball team can be found below.

#0C2340

The Pelicans red HEX colour code for the New Orleans Pelicans can be found below.

#C8102E

The Pelicans gold HEX colour code for the New Orleans Pelicans can be found below.

#85714D

New Orleans Pelicans Color Codes RGB

The New Orleans Pelicans colors RGB codes are (0, 22, 65) for Pelicans navy, (225, 58, 62) for Pelicans red, and (180, 151, 90) for Pelicans gold colour.

The Pelicans navy RGB color code for the New Orleans Pelicans can be found below.

(0, 22, 65)

The Pelicans red RGB colour code for the New Orleans Pelicans can be found below.

(225, 58, 62)

The Pelicans gold RGB colour code for the New Orleans Pelicans can be found below.

(180, 151, 90)

New Orleans Pelicans Color Codes CMYK

The New Orleans Pelicans colors CMYK codes are (100, 76, 12, 70) for Pelicans navy, (0, 91, 76, 6) for Pelicans red, and (40, 48, 76, 16) for Pelicans gold color.

The Pelicans navy CMYK color code for the New Orleans Pelicans can be found below.

(100, 76, 12, 70)

The Pelicans red CMYK colour code for the New Orleans Pelicans can be found below.

(0, 91, 76, 6)

The Pelicans gold CMYK colour code for the New Orleans Pelicans can be found below.

(40, 48, 76, 16)

New Orleans Pelicans Logo Colors

The New Orleans Pelicans logo colors are Pelicans navy, Pelicans red, and Pelicans gold. The Pelicans navy color code for the New Orleans Pelicans logo is Pantone: PMS 289 C, Hex Color: #0C2340, RGB: (0, 22, 65), CMYK: (100, 76, 12, 70). The Pelicans red color code for the New Orleans Pelicans logo is Pantone: PMS 186 C, Hex Color: #C8102E, RGB: (225, 58, 62), CMYK: (0, 91, 76, 6). The Pelicans gold color code for the New Orleans Pelicans logo is Pantone: PMS 872 C, Hex Color: #85714D, RGB: (180, 151, 90), CMYK: (40, 48, 76, 16).

New Orleans Pelicans Logo

The New Orleans Pelicans logo has Pelicans navy, Pelicans red, and Pelicans gold colors with a red-eyed pelican that has a ball in its beak. The New Orleans Pelicans logo meaning symbolizes the colors that make up the municipal flag of New Orleans.

New Orleans Pelicans Logo Color Palette Image Format

The New Orleans Pelicans logo colours can be found in an image format below.

New Orleans Pelicans Logo Fonts

The New Orleans Pelicans logo font is a custom New Orleans Pelicans typeface. The custom New Orleans Pelicans font is used for jersey lettering, player names, numbers, team logo, branding, and merchandise.

New Orleans Pelicans Logo JPG

The New Orleans Pelicans logo JPG format can be found below.

To download the New Orleans Pelicans logo JPG format, right-click and choose save.

New Orleans Pelicans Logo PNG

The New Orleans Pelicans logo PNG format can be found below.

To download the New Orleans Pelicans logo PNG format, right-click and choose save.

New Orleans Pelicans Jersey 2022

The New Orleans Pelicans jersey colors are Pelicans navy, Pelicans gold, Pelicans red, and white. The New Orleans Pelicans uniform has last been changed in 2013. The New Orleans Pelicans jersey in an image format can be found below.

To download the New Orleans Pelicans jersey image, right click and choose save.
